segments.text: Good morning . More Hotel . At your service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: good morning ! I'd like to make a reservation , please . Do you have any rooms available for the next week ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Double-room , please . It's for an American couple .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hold on , please . Let me check the bookings . Yes , we have double-rooms available . What kind of room would you like , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like a room with a nice view , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have a nice garden-view room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . I'll take that one . Is there a bar in your hotel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . And there is also a party going on each Saturday night in the bar till next morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Party all night ? Hotel California ? No kidding . Anyway , what's the room charge ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 888 Yuan per night . With breakfast . “ Northern Star ” buffet ! What's there arriving time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They turn up around 4p . m . next Monday , and they check out on next Sunday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . May I have your name and phone number ?
segments.speaker: S1
